text: A mouse embryonic tissue Northern blot filter ( Seegene , Rockville , Maryland , United States ) was hybridized with a <extra_id_0> Sox6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> probe generated by RT-PCR ( nucleotides 1353-1927 ) and labeled with [ alpha-32P ] dCTP , by random primer labeling ( RediprimeII ; Amersham Biosciences , Buckinghamshire , England , United Kingdom ) .
The hybridization was performed in phosphate buffered 7 % SDS hybridization solution .
Blots were washed with 0.2x SSC , 1 % SDS at 60 degreesC prior to exposure to X-ray film ( Kodak , Rochester , New York , United States ) at -80 degreesC for 6 d .
